name: The Seminarist
description:
Play this game and also you will say: "look mommy, i became Pope!"  Controls: 
  • firing position, defence: "wasd" / "arrow keys"
  • fire, reload: "right alt" / "left ctrl"
  • bonus, blasphemy: "right ctrl" / "left alt"
  • select, pause: "space"
  • mute: "enter"
  • quit, exit: "esc"
?????: "j" (find the cheat..) Hold on "r" in start screen to reset game progress! It is recommended a minimum screen resolution of 1280x720. To report bugs or compatibility issues, please send an email to: insanostudio(at)hotmail(dot)com. Please don't report bugs or crashes in the comments! Thanks for playing The Seminarist! Check out insanostudio games on: https://www.instagram.com/insanostudio_gamedev/ https://www.youtube.com/user/InsanoStudio/ for news, updates, and more!
